ar.com.hjg.pngj

Class DeflatedChunkReader

  • java.lang.Object
    • ar.com.hjg.pngj.ChunkReader
      • ar.com.hjg.pngj.DeflatedChunkReader

  • public class DeflatedChunkReader
extends ChunkReader
    Specialization of ChunkReader, for IDAT-like chunks. These chunks are part of a set of similar chunks (contiguos normally, not necessariyl) which conforms a zlib stream
